directions: Heat oven to 200C/180C fan/gas 6. Bring a large pan of water to the boil. Add the carrots, bring back up to the boil and cook for 5 mins. Drain and leave in a colander to steam dry for a few mins, and then toss in a large roasting tin with the oil, honey, vinegar and seasoning. Roast the carrots for 30-40 mins.
ingredients: 2 tbsp red wine or cider vinegar
title: Roasted carrots
